statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS Total_Vehicles FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC, vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Schedule
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM Maintenance_Schedule
SELECT vehicle_name FROM Test_Vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV'
SELECT * FROM Test_Vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Maintenance_Schedule
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Schedule
SELECT vehicle_id, last_maintenance_date FROM Maintenance_Schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, next_maintenance_date FROM Maintenance_Schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT Test_Vehicles.vehicle_name, Maintenance_Schedule.next_maintenance_date FROM Test_Vehicles JOIN Maintenance_Schedule ON Test_Vehicles.vehicle_id = Maintenance_Schedule.vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM Test_Vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV'
SELECT id, make, model, year FROM vehicle;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT technician_name, labor_hours, repair_details FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC;
SELECT description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE date_of_service BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle WHERE make LIKE 'To%' ORDER BY year DESC;

SELECT v.make, v.model, ms.date_of_service, ml.technician_name FROM vehicle v JOIN maintenance_schedule ms ON v.id = ms.vehicle_id JOIN maintenance_logs ml ON ms.schedule_id = ml.schedule_id WHERE v.year > 2015 ORDER BY ms.date_of_service DESC, ml.labor_hours ASC;

SELECT v.make, v.model, ms.date_of_service, ml.technician_name, ml.repair_details FROM vehicle v JOIN maintenance_schedule ms ON v.id = ms.vehicle_id JOIN maintenance_logs ml ON ms.schedule_id = ml.schedule_id WHERE v.make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY ms.date_of_service ASC;

SELECT v.make, v.model, ms.date_of_service, ml.technician_name, ml.repair_details FROM vehicle v JOIN maintenance_schedule ms ON v.id = ms.vehicle_id JOIN maintenance_logs ml ON ms.schedule_id = ml.schedule_id WHERE v.year < 2010 ORDER BY ml.labor_hours DESC, ms.date_of_service ASC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, manufacture_date FROM Vehicle ORDER BY manufacture_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM MaintenanceTask WHERE frequency > 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacture_date FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, task_id, log_date FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacture_date FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM MaintenanceTask WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLog INNER JOIN TaskAssignment ON MaintenanceLog.task_id = TaskAssignment.task_id WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT v.vehicle_name, t.task_name, m.log_date FROM Vehicle v JOIN MaintenanceLog m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id JOIN MaintenanceTask t ON m.task_id = t.task_id;
SELECT * FROM test_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM test_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_record WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_role FROM maintenance_personnel WHERE personnel_role = 'Technician';
SELECT history_id, vehicle_id, history_date FROM vehicle_history WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM test_vehicles WHERE vehicle_name = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, last_maintenance_date FROM test_vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT m.record_id, m.maintenance_type, m.maintenance_cost, v.vehicle_name FROM maintenance_record m JOIN test_vehicles v ON m.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE m.maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT p.personnel_name, p.personnel_role, l.log_date FROM maintenance_personnel p JOIN maintenance_logs l ON p.personnel_id = l.personnel_id ORDER BY l.log_date ASC;

SELECT v.vehicle_name, h.maintenance_type, h.history_description FROM test_vehicles v LEFT JOIN vehicle_history h ON v.vehicle_id = h.vehicle_id WHERE h.history_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
